name: @s3-upload-utility/backend
description: AWS CDK backend for S3 upload utility

scripts.deploy: npm run check-profile && cdk deploy --profile berry --require-approval broadening
scripts.check-profile: node -e "if(process.env.AWS_PROFILE && process.env.AWS_PROFILE !== 'berry') { console.error('ERROR: AWS_PROFILE must be berry, not ' + process.env.AWS_PROFILE); process.exit(1); }"
